"A.D.2028/6/6/14:00": "It's been one month since then. The world went back to normal quicker than I expected."
"Me and Kohri are in our second year of high school. Big bro is a third year now."
"School is back to normal, and classes have resumed. The student council is the same as before too."

"Stu, stu, stu, student council～♪
Dra, dra, dra, draft budget～♪"
"Do, do, do, do it again～♪..."
"Hmm...? Oh, Hitsugi. Mr. Aratron sent us a message."
"He says he wants you to help in the upcoming ESCA maintenance. I'll tell him \"okay!\"."
"The current Mother Cluster is hiding the abscence of Mother, with Mr. Aratron in charge."
"Taking on Mother's wishes, he worked hard to change the organization to support Earth in secret."
"Sorry for the intrusion!"
"Oh, Enga. Wait, w-what are you doing?! Hiding in a place like that..."
"It's fine, shhh! Don't look this way, don't make it obvious. Crap!"
"Hey, 10% sexy guy! You're the only one in 3C who didn't turn in their homework! Stop running and give up!"
"He hasn't turned in his modern Japanese homework either. He probably didn't even do it. Not knowing when to give up is so uncool."
"Ah, I see... So what's what it was."
"Under the authority of Mother Cluster, Och and Phul came in as teachers without any warning."
"Since they're world famous mathmaticians and writers, they caused quite a ruckus when they arrived, but it's all blown over now."
"According to Phul, it was what Och wanted, but... She seems to be enjoying herself as well."
"If you don't intend to come out, I supposed it can't be helped. Maxwell!"
"Hey! That's not fair at all!"
"Target secured! Phul, if you please."
"Yes, yes. Three people to the study room, let's go."
"Their abilities are being used as playthings... Is that okay?"
"I think it's a good thing. Using and mastering the abilities you have... Definitely not a bad thing."
"Wha, Ms. Phaleg?!"
"Greetings. I'm glad you two are in good health. How about a battle once you're done with work?"
"Ah, ahaha, Hitsugi and I still have a lot of work to do, so... we can't really..."
"A shame. All my opponents are too busy and won't fight with me."
"I tried to invite that person as well, but they won't seem to accept my challenge."
"Ms. Phaelg appears suddenly as always, from time to time. I thought she'd disappear after that day, but she's still around."
"H-How about some tea, or-"
"No worries. I just stopped by to ask."
"Well, whenever you feel like battling, feel free to give me a call, anytime."
"Ophiel was taken away by Ms. Phaleg, and is apparently doing lots of work."
"Since it would be impossible to judge him with our system, she said it would be better to make him do so much work that he wished he was dead... I don't really get it."
"Argh! While we appreciate the donations, it's so hard to allocate the money properly!"
"The reason my job is never ending, and the reason the budge proposal keeps changing... is all YMT Corporation's fault!"
"I'm not sure if it was because he heard about Ophiel's treatment or not, but that perverted CEO seemed to have a change of heart. He apparently began working on various charity projects."
"Perhaps the reason why he sends all these donations and worked to fix the Ether communication system is his way of atoning for his sins?"
"Alright! All my clerical work is done!"
"What?! Even with all that's been going on?!"
"What do you think I've been so quiet? Kohri, what you lack is concentration!"
"Seriously... It's impossible to concentrate in such a situation..."
"I got used to it."
"Big sis! You didn't go yet, right?!"
"Aru, no running in the hall! How many times have I told you?"
"I think he just takes after you, Hitsugi."

"Shut it.
So, Aru, how was your first day of school?"
"Er... uhm... It was a lot of fun, and... and I'm so happy! "
"Right? I forced the elementary school to let you in, so you have to make at least 100 friends!"
"Okay! I'll make some for Mother too, and make at least 200 friends!"
"Aru remained here. We were hoping he would... and he wanted to."
"Well, Aru, let's go."
"Yes!"
"Right, we'll all go together and-"
"You can come once you've finished your work... right?"
"Noooooooo!"
"Big sis, let's go!"
"Yep."

"アークスは……アークスシップはあの後
そのまま向こうの世界に留まった。"

"こっちの世界は守り切れたと判断したのか
幻創種の対応時をのぞいて
過剰な干渉は避けるようになった。"

"だから、あれからずっと会えてなかった。
あたしにも、こっちでやらなきゃいけないことが
いっぱいあったし、なかなか会いに行けなかった。"

"……こっちの忙しなさを悟ってなのか
向こうから会いに来てくれることも、なかった。"

"そのへんは、ちょっとぐらい
気をきかせて欲しかったけど……まあいい。"
"そのほうが、びっくりしてくれるはずだから。"

"あーっと、アポなしで管理室へ立ち入りは……
……って、ヒツギさん！？\u3000アルくんも！"

"うわー、うわうわうわー！\u3000お久しぶりです！
どうしたんです今日は、急にいらっしゃって！
言ってくれればエスコートしたのに！"

"……あ、その顔。
なーんとなく目的がわかりましたよ。"
"それではさっそく、ごたいめーん！"
"え、こんないきなり！？"

"あ、えっと……その……あああー
何喋ろうとしたんだっけ、あたし！"
"ええい、もう細かいことはいいや！"

"<%me>！\u3000お待たせ！
一緒に冒険、行こう！"
